Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs and goals. This exceptional product carries a value of $1000000 to me, reflecting its unique features and capabilities. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset at a favorable discount. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further or if there's any way I can provide more information to help you make an informed decision. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
